name: BLUE BEAR
description:
Blue bear represents all those boring guys, they put the numbers in front of people, if they talk too much they prove to be racist in minutes. They usually scream and lose their balance. That guy who treats employees badly, middle class who defends millionaire fortunes. Very cute blue bear, chooses to kill only the poors. 


Polarized Cards is a new project from a dirty deck, from a world worse than ever. Gamblers and cowards mingle in the crowd. faceless and heartless. My experiencial vision of brazilians people polarized.
